content: an extra-quick toque knit in the round from brim to top top a great last minute gift switch to double pointed needles when needed this hat will fit most adult heads but can be adjusted by adding or subtracting stitches in groups of six which will round 1 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 50 sts add/subtract about 2 to the hat circumference round 2 & 3 k all sts yarn berroco vintage chunky 52% acrylic 40% wool round 4 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 40 sts 8% nylon 136yds per 100g 1 skein or katia paradise merino 93% merino wool 7% round 5 k all sts nylon 109yds per 100g 1 ball round 6 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 30 sts needles 8mm/us11 40cm/16 circular and set of 4 double pointed needles round 7 k all sts gauge 13 sts = 4 /10cm in stocking stitch round 8 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 20 sts other tools stitch marker darning needle round 9 k2tog around 10 abbreviations sts body k knit p purl break yarn pull through co 60 sts on circular needle join in the round & place k1tbl knit 1 through remaining sts and pull marker at beginning of round back of loop tight weave in all ends k1tbl p1 around until work measures 2 5 from edge and block k2tog knit 2 together repeat repeat k all sts until work measures 6 from edge round round co cast on st s stitch es © 2024 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
